es/clients/CharteredInstituteofProcurementSupply/%7B36084180-aa1e-4295-a16f-49f74d326a42%7D_VIP_INVITE_16th_June__2025__Let%27s_talk_Tariffs__Webinar_for_CIPS_MENA_%281280_x_400_px%29_%285%29.png> 	

 
 
 
 
 <https://image.cipscomms.org/EloquaImages/clients/CharteredInstituteofProcurementSupply/%7B9e689fa9-b844-438f-add4-29e464be4785%7D_Icon-Calendar.png> 	
 <https://image.cipscomms.org/EloquaImages/clients/CharteredInstituteofProcurementSupply/%7B584ea26f-8fa1-40e8-992c-48cb85c69b73%7D_Icon-Location.png> 	
 
MONDAY 16 JUNE
5:30PM - 18:30 GST/GMT +4
ZOOM WEBINAR
 
Lets talk tariffs, webinar by CIPS MENA

Tariffs impacting your bottom line? Join us for expert insights that could change your strategy – join us for this exclusive webinar. 
REGISTER NOW <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/QPlWCqMy4TJAGxkhNtLhEvyzm?domain=app.cipscomms.org>  
 
 
 
Tariffs are no longer just a trade issue – they’ve become a critical procurement priority.

Join us today, Monday, 16 June at 5:30 PM GST for an exclusive webinar with Thomas Gaengler, Chief Procurement Officer at Mondelēz International. Gain first-hand insight into how one of the world’s leading FMCG giants is navigating today’s complex and fast-changing tariff landscape.
 
 <https://image.cipscomms.org/EloquaImages/clients/CharteredInstituteofProcurementSupply/%7B18dd07c3-72fa-43ee-a6d7-408965e545ec%7D_Untitled_design_%2817%29.png> 	
Sam Achampong
CIPS
 
 <https://image.cipscomms.org/EloquaImages/clients/CharteredInstituteofProcurementSupply/%7Bb05b3486-0af8-4e7a-99c5-0ec6e1f7589f%7D_Untitled_design_%2816%29.png> 	
Thomas Gaengler Mondelēz
 
Hosted by Sam Achampong FCIPS, Regional Director – AMEA, CIPS, this session will explore:

upply/%7Bb05b3486-0af8-4e7a-99c5-0ec6e1f7589f%7D_Untitled_design_%2816%29.png> 	
Thomas Gaengler Mondelēz
 
Hosted by Sam Achampong FCIPS, Regional Director – AMEA, CIPS, this session will explore:


*	The true impact of tariffs on procurement and supply chains
*	How Mondelēz is adapting its global sourcing strategy
*	Strategies to manage risk, cost, and compliance amidst shifting trade policies
*	Actionable takeaways for procurement leaders across the MENA region


Whether you're managing regional sourcing or driving global strategy, this session is a must-attend to stay ahead of the curve.
 <https://url.uk.m.mimecastprotect.com/s/8mgKCrMz4T4KXznHNukh4qb30?domain=app.cipscomms.org>
